page.title: 13SKIPSEA CUBS
page.content:
The Akela is Mr Eddie Knapp. There are 4 groups and they're named after 4 colours called Reds,Blues,Whites and Yellows. There are lots of games to play. There's this game called Ships. To play the game you have to have a lot of people.A person every time is out. You've got several positions to go to. There's another game called Hot Rice. You need a lot of people to play this as well. There's a person who's got a ball in his hand and he's got to try and hit you. There are three different Arrow Tests which you can pass, there's a Bronze Arrow, Silver Arrow and a Gold Arrow.
Here are some badges that you can win. You can get a Camping Badge and a Swimming Badge and an Explorers Badge.
By Adrian Jones & Craig Waites
